metadata.title: Best Anime 2023-2025 Database
metadata.description: Comprehensive list of the best anime series and movies from 2023 to 2025

anime_list.name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Swordsmith Village Arc
anime_list.name_japanese: 鬼滅の刃 刀鍛冶の里編
anime_list.author: Koyoharu Gotouge
anime_list.synopsis: Third season focusing on the Swordsmith Village arc where Tanjiro trains with new breathing techniques.

anime_list.name: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 2
anime_list.name_japanese: 呪術廻戦 第2期
anime_list.author: Gege Akutami
anime_list.synopsis: Second season covering the Hidden Inventory arc and Shibuya Incident arc.

anime_list.name: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
anime_list.name_japanese: 葬送のフリーレン
anime_list.author: Kanehito Yamada
anime_list.synopsis: An elf mage embarks on a journey to understand humans and the meaning of life after her hero companion's death.

anime_list.name: Attack on Titan: The Final Season - Final Chapters
anime_list.name_japanese: 進撃の巨人 The Final Season完結編
anime_list.author: Hajime Isayama
anime_list.synopsis: The final conclusion to the Attack on Titan saga with the ultimate battle for humanity's freedom.

anime_list.name: Chainsaw Man
anime_list.name_japanese: チェンソーマン
anime_list.author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
anime_list.synopsis: Denji becomes Chainsaw Man to pay off his debt while fighting devils in a dark supernatural world.

anime_list.name: Suzume
anime_list.name_japanese: すずめの戸締まり
anime_list.author: Makoto Shinkai
anime_list.synopsis: A coming-of-age story about a girl who must close doors causing disasters across Japan.

anime_list.name: Hell's Paradise
anime_list.name_japanese: 地獄楽
anime_list.author: Yuji Kaku
anime_list.synopsis: Death row inmates search for the elixir of life on a mysterious island filled with dangers.

anime_list.name: Oshi no Ko
anime_list.name_japanese: 【推しの子】
anime_list.author: Aka Akasaka
anime_list.synopsis: A doctor reincarnated as the son of his favorite idol seeks to uncover the truth behind her murder.

anime_list.name: Mob Psycho 100 III
anime_list.name_japanese: モブサイコ100 III
anime_list.author: ONE
anime_list.synopsis: The final season following Mob's journey to control his psychic powers and find his place in the world.

anime_list.name: Spy x Family Season 2
anime_list.name_japanese: SPY×FAMILY Season 2
anime_list.author: Tatsuya Endo
anime_list.synopsis: The Forger family continues their undercover missions while maintaining their fake family facade.

anime_list.name: Solo Leveling
anime_list.name_japanese: 俺だけレベルアップな件
anime_list.author: Chugong
anime_list.synopsis: The weakest hunter becomes the strongest through a mysterious leveling system.

anime_list.name: Dungeon Meshi
anime_list.name_japanese: ダンジョン飯
anime_list.author: Ryoko Kui
anime_list.synopsis: Adventurers cook and eat dungeon monsters while searching for their lost companion.

anime_list.name: Wind Breaker
anime_list.name_japanese: ウィンドブレイカー
anime_list.author: Satoru Nii
anime_list.synopsis: A delinquent student joins a school known for its fighting prowess and protecting the town.

anime_list.name: Kaiju No. 8
anime_list.name_japanese: 怪獣8号
anime_list.author: Naoya Matsumoto
anime_list.synopsis: A man gains kaiju powers and joins the defense force to fight monsters threatening Japan.

anime_list.name: My Hero Academia Season 7
anime_list.name_japanese: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 第7期
anime_list.author: Kohei Horikoshi
anime_list.synopsis: The final war arc where heroes face their greatest challenge against All For One and Shigaraki.

anime_list.name: Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc
anime_list.name_japanese: 鬼滅の刃 柱稽古編
anime_list.author: Koyoharu Gotouge
anime_list.synopsis: The Hashira prepare for the final battle against Muzan by training the Demon Slayer Corps.

anime_list.name: The Boy and the Heron
anime_list.name_japanese: 君たちはどう生きるか
anime_list.author: Hayao Miyazaki
anime_list.synopsis: A young boy enters a magical world with the help of a grey heron after his mother's death.

anime_list.name: Blue Lock Season 2
anime_list.name_japanese: ブルーロック Season 2
anime_list.author: Muneyuki Kaneshiro
anime_list.synopsis: The U-20 Japan match arc where Blue Lock players face the national team.

anime_list.name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime Season 3
anime_list.name_japanese: 転生したらスライムだった件 第3期
anime_list.author: Fuse
anime_list.synopsis: Rimuru faces new challenges as his nation grows and international politics become complex.

anime_list.name: Re:Zero Season 3
anime_list.name_japanese: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活 第3期
anime_list.author: Tappei Nagatsuki
anime_list.synopsis: Subaru continues his journey in the fantasy world, facing new trials and mysteries.

anime_list.name: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle Arc
anime_list.name_japanese: 鬼滅の刃 無限城編
anime_list.author: Koyoharu Gotouge
anime_list.synopsis: The final battle arc where Tanjiro and the Demon Slayers face Muzan in the Infinity Castle.

anime_list.name: Jujutsu Kaisen: Culling Game Arc
anime_list.name_japanese: 呪術廻戦 死滅回游編
anime_list.author: Gege Akutami
anime_list.synopsis: The Culling Game arc where sorcerers participate in a deadly tournament to save Japan.

anime_list.name: Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War Part 4
anime_list.name_japanese: BLEACH 千年血戦篇-相剋譚-
anime_list.author: Tite Kubo
anime_list.synopsis: The final part of the Thousand-Year Blood War arc, concluding Ichigo's battle against Yhwach.

anime_list.name: One Piece: Egghead Arc
anime_list.name_japanese: ワンピース エッグヘッド編
anime_list.author: Eiichiro Oda
anime_list.synopsis: The Straw Hats arrive at Dr. Vegapunk's futuristic island and uncover major world secrets.

anime_list.name: Haikyuu!! The Dumpster Battle
anime_list.name_japanese: 劇場版ハイキュー!! ゴミ捨て場の決戦
anime_list.author: Haruichi Furudate
anime_list.synopsis: The long-awaited match between Karasuno and Nekoma high schools in the nationals.

anime_list.name: Vinland Saga Season 2
anime_list.name_japanese: ヴィンランド・サガ SEASON2
anime_list.author: Makoto Yukimura
anime_list.synopsis: Thorfinn's journey of redemption and self-discovery on a farm, moving away from violence.

anime_list.name: Mashle: Magic and Muscles Season 2
anime_list.name_japanese: マッシュル-MASHLE- 神覚者候補選抜試験編
anime_list.author: Hajime Komoto
anime_list.synopsis: Mash continues to prove that muscles can overcome magic in the Divine Visionary exam arc.

anime_list.name: Dr. Stone: New World
anime_list.name_japanese: ドクターストーン NEW WORLD
anime_list.author: Riichiro Inagaki
anime_list.synopsis: Senku's team ventures across the ocean to find the source of the petrification phenomenon.

anime_list.name: Bocchi the Rock!
anime_list.name_japanese: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！
anime_list.author: Aki Hamaji
anime_list.synopsis: An introverted girl forms a band and overcomes her social anxiety through music.

anime_list.name: Lycoris Recoil
anime_list.name_japanese: リコリス・リコイル
anime_list.author: Spider Lily
anime_list.synopsis: Two girls work as assassins in a seemingly peaceful organization in modern Japan.

anime_list.name: The Eminence in Shadow Season 2
anime_list.name_japanese: 陰の実力者になりたくて！ 2nd season
anime_list.author: Daisuke Aizawa
anime_list.synopsis: Cid continues his elaborate fantasy of being a mastermind behind the scenes.

anime_list.name: The Apothecary Diaries
anime_list.name_japanese: 薬屋のひとりごと
anime_list.author: Natsu Hyuuga
anime_list.synopsis: A pharmacist girl solves mysteries in the imperial palace while avoiding court intrigue.

anime_list.name: Dandadan
anime_list.name_japanese: ダンダダン
anime_list.author: Yukinobu Tatsu
anime_list.synopsis: A boy who believes in ghosts and a girl who believes in aliens encounter both.

anime_list.name: Sakamoto Days
anime_list.name_japanese: サカモトデイズ
anime_list.author: Yuto Suzuki
anime_list.synopsis: A legendary hitman tries to live a peaceful life as a convenience store owner.

anime_list.name: Tower of God Season 2
anime_list.name_japanese: 神之塔 -Tower of God- 第2期
anime_list.author: SIU
anime_list.synopsis: Bam continues climbing the Tower to reunite with Rachel and uncover its secrets.

anime_list.name: Overlord IV
anime_list.name_japanese: オーバーロードIV
anime_list.author: Kugane Maruyama
anime_list.synopsis: Ainz continues expanding Nazarick's influence in the New World.
